contrast__header.info: Choose "Use alternate section color" at the bottom of a section's settings to use this secondary color scheme there.

sale_badge_includes_percent.label: Include sale percentage on sales badge

swatch_options.label: Variant option for swatches
swatch_options.info: Variant option name to use for displaying swatches. Use a comma separated list to support multiple options: "Color, Colour"

chip_options.label: Variant option for chips
chip_options.info: Variant option name to use for displaying chips. Use a comma separated list to support multiple options: "Size, Material, Fabric".

cart_enable_ajax.label: Show notification when item is added to cart

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

enable_payment_button.label: Show dynamic checkout button
enable_payment_button.info: Let customers check out directly using a familiar payment method. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

popup__header.info: Add a popup to display extra information about your products, like a size guide.

variant_popup_option.label: Option name for Information popup
variant_popup_option.info: Write the option name that will display a link to the information popup. Example: "Size".

variant_popup_page.label: Information popup content
variant_popup_page.info: Choose a page as a source for the popup content. You can add text, tables, or images to this page.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

paragraph__1.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

paragraph__2.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

heading.label: Accordion heading
heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.

inventory_max.label: Inventory base quantity
inventory_max.info: Enter the initial quantity of your product inventory. Insert a Dynamic source to set different base quantities for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/featured-product#inventory-counter)

low_inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold
low_inventory_threshold.info: Set the product inventory quantity to alert customers when limited quantities are available. Insert a Dynamic source to set different thresholds for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/featured-product#inventory-counter)

language__header.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

currency__header.info: To add a currency, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

social_media__header.info: Configure account links in theme settings.

payment__header.info: Only shows icons for payment types that your store supports.

title.label: Heading
title.info: Include a heading for your text. The heading functions as a toggle on smaller screen sizes.

title.label: Heading
title.info: Include a heading for your text. The heading functions as a toggle on smaller screen sizes.

title.label: Heading
title.info: Include a heading for your text. The heading functions as a toggle on smaller screen sizes.

enable_transparent_home.label: Enable on home page
enable_transparent_home.info: Ensure that you have a Slideshow or Video hero section as the first section on your homepage.

logo_transparent.label: Logo image
logo_transparent.info: Default logo will be used if no image is set.

image.label: Image
image.info: Displayed if the map isn’t loaded

header.info: Map address and a valid Google Maps API key are required.

map_address.label: Map address
map_address.info: Google Maps will find the exact location.

api_key.label: Google Maps API key
api_key.info: Register a Google Maps API key to display the map. Learn more about [registering a Google Maps API key](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/os/customize/map-section-api-key).

paragraph.content: Customers who subscribe will have their email address added to the “accepts marketing” [customer list](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1).

enable_popup.label: Enable
enable_popup.info: Show a popup the first time the user's cursor leaves your site.

likes.label: Number of likes
likes.info: Misleading customers with fake numbers could fall under “unfair or deceptive acts or practices” in the [FTC Act](https://ca.practicallaw.thomsonreuters.com/w-007-7584).

video_url.label: Video link
video_url.info: Use a direct link to an .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/video-hero#add-a-video).

blog_show_pagination.label: Show pagination
blog_show_pagination.info: Pagination will appear when you have multiple blog articles to display

content_max_width.label: Max width of content
content_max_width.info: Adjusts the width of the article content.

cart_ajax_enable.label: Enable automatic cart updates
cart_ajax_enable.info: Updates the cart as soon as customer changes are made

pagination.label: Pagination
pagination.info: Choose how additional pages of products are navigated.

show_swatches_and_chips.label: Show swatches and chips
show_swatches_and_chips.info: Reveals product options on hover. To learn more about setting up swatches and chips, check out our [documentation](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/product-pages#set-up-product-chips).

paragraph.content: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose 'Selected' and add collection blocks.

content_max_width.label: Max width of content
content_max_width.info: Adjusts the width of the page content. [Learn more about creating pages](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/pages).

content_max_width.label: Max width of content
content_max_width.info: Adjusts the width of the page content. [Learn more about creating pages](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/pages).

video_url.label: Video link
video_url.info: Use a direct link to an .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/video-hero#add-a-video).

image.label: Image
image.info: Use an image with a 2:3 width to height ratio (recommended).

heading.label: Accordion heading
heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.

popup__header.info: Add a popup to display extra information about your products, like a size guide.

variant_popup_option.label: Option name for Information popup
variant_popup_option.info: Write the option name that will display a link to the information popup. Example: "Size".

variant_popup_page.label: Information popup content
variant_popup_page.info: Choose a page as a source for the popup content. You can add text, tables, or images to this page.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

paragraph__1.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

paragraph__2.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

inventory_max.info: Enter the initial quantity of your product inventory. Insert a Dynamic source to set different base quantities for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/product-pages#inventory-counter)

low_inventory_threshold.info: Set the product inventory quantity to alert customers when limited quantities are available. Insert a Dynamic source to set different thresholds for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/product-pages#inventory-counter)
